name: Vampiric Stuff
description:
<color_red>Adds night creatures, new items, monsters and locations.</color>
<color_light_red>More on interactions with npcs and quests, providing a subtle RPG playstyle.

<color_light_cyan>Note that this mod is currently in <color_light_green>stable</color> state. Bugs rarely appears, but if you encounter one or a recent CDDA update has caused an error, feel free to notify the author by creating an issue on its GitHub repository or sending a PM on Discord.</color>
